summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated June 6, 2021, regarding a draft letter about conditions at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The email includes a request for edits before sending the letter to 'the chiefs'.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, who has drafted a letter regarding conditions at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) and is seeking edits before sending it to superiors.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 6, 2021, concerning conditions at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
A draft letter on the topic is attached to the email, and the sender is requesting edits before sending it to 'the chiefs'.
